title: One man's challenge
creator_credit: George Noordhof, Peter Carden, Derek Stewart Productions and Empire Rheumatism Council
brief_description: The story of a man crippled by rheumatoid arthritis and his struggle to overcome some of the effects of his disability. To-day, much can be done by hospital and patient to arrest development of the disease.
